thread.title_full: Eva Mendes Suggests Ryan Gosling's Sweet Speech Was Her 'Favorite Moment' Of The Golden Globes! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Eva Mendes Suggests Ryan Gosling's Sweet Speech Was 'Favorite Moment' Of The Golden Globes!
text:
These two!
On Sunday, Ryan Gosling adorably dedicated his Golden Globes acceptance speech to Eva Mendes and their two little girls.
Related: Ryan Reynolds & Andrew Garfield Made Out At The Globes! 
Well, on Monday, the brunette beauty took to Instagram to rave about Janelle Monáe 's red carpet look, but also hinted that her main man's touching tribute was her "favorite moment of the night."
Take a look for yourself (below)!
